attributes.action: Stop the redevelopment of our homes for heroes in Glebe Road and Mount Crescent, Stratford Upon Avon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: South Warwickshire Housing Association are planning to demolish OUR HOMES FOR HEROES and replace them with twice the number of houses, they will be turning Glebe Road and mount Crescent into a building site and then into an inner city style estate with cramped housing and all the problems this brings with it.  Please help us save our homes and our peaceful community, including our nature (bats, birds, rodents and insects)by signing our petition.
